title: System Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Improving Evaluation and Supervision Methods in Nursing Clinical Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the components and application methods of the CLES+T assessment tool.
Learners can derive improvement strategies through clinical learning environment evaluations.
Learners can design effective clinical supervision strategies in mobile environments.
Learners can propose project-based improvements for clinical learning environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
